tutorialSteps.topText: Welcome to Blobs. The goal of the game is to clear all blobs off the board. You can clear a Blob by merging it into another one of a different color as long as they are on a shared row or column.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: Try merging the purple Blob onto the one next to it.

tutorialSteps.topText: See that flag pole? Thatâ€™s a Flag Blob. Flag Blobs can lead to a win when merged, as long as there are no other Blobs on the board.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: Flags can't initiate a merge, but any normal Blob of the same color that is merged with it will clear. Try it out!
